title: Exception throws when exporting data from a table containing highlight/map
description: When exporting data from the attached report, an exception is thrown. This occurs when the report contains a table with a group, a highlight rule, and a map rule in the group row.
OB: When attempting to export data from the table, an exception is thrown.
EB: The data should be successfully exported from the table without any exceptions.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Add a table to the report that has a group, a highlight rule and a map rule in the group row. 2. Preview the report. 3. Export the data from the table.
